original_text: You must destroy all the peoples the Lord your God gives over to you. Do not look on them with pity and do not serve their gods, for that will be a snare to you.
korean_text: 네 하나님 여호와께서 네게 넘겨주신 모든 민족을 네 눈이 긍휼히 여기지 말고 진멸하며 그들의 신을 섬기지 말라 그것이 네게 올무가 되리라

sentences.original_text: You must destroy all the peoples
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 모든 백성을 반드시 진멸해야 한다

sentences.original_text: the Lord your God gives over to you
Do not look on them with pity
and do not serve their gods
for that will be a snare to you
